Text: Works well on Windows XP 32-bit. Thanks for great upload!

Then I downloaded this torrent and it was so unbelievably simple ... just install and play!!

As for suggestions ... maybe Riven or Exile next ?  =) thanks!

Mr. TweakedInferno
